## KeyboardEventParams interface

A parameter builder interface describing the event which triggers the keyboard event handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface KeyboardEventParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [event](./prosemirror-suggest.keyboardeventparams.event.md) | <code>KeyboardEvent</code> | The keyboard event which triggered the call to the event handler. |
